Family Background: Zbinden Egli Lehmann is currently single. He does not have any children.
Education Background:
Zbinden graduated from Kantonsschule Frauenfeld Thurgau in 1999.
After that, he went on to study at University of Lucerne until 2004.
Occupation History:
Having worked for over 21 years, Zbinden Egli Lehmann brings a wealth of experience and expertise to his current role. He is known for his strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
Zbinden Egli Lehmann began his professional journey as a Property Manager at  Implenia AG in 2004, laying the foundation for future success.
At ALLREAL Group AG, he held the position of Developer from 2009 till now, making significant contributions to the organization.
Wealth Summary:

He has house located in Thun, worth 3220000 CHF.

In addition to his primary residence, he owns villa in Lausanne worth 4320000 CHF.


Following the passing of his mother, a successful Hedge Fund Manager, he received an inheritance of 2240000 CHF in 2010, which he has used to secure his financial future.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have Zbinden as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
